description.value:
Requirements You are within 10 feet of water at least 10 feet deep, and your Speed is sufficient to reach the water in one Stride.

Trigger You successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} a creature of the same size as you or smaller.

You Stride up to 10 feet to enter the water, bringing the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed} creature with you into the water.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Absalom, City of Lost Omens
